item.title: shell | 服务器巡检脚本
item.description: #!/bin/bash #参数定义 date=`date +"%Y-%m-%d-%H:%M:%S"` centosVersion=$(awk '{print $(NF-1)}' /etc/redhat-release) VERSION=`date +%F` #日志相关 LOGPATH="/tmp/awr" [ -e $LOGPATH ] || mkdir -p $LOGPATH RESULTFILE="$LOGPATH/HostCheck-`hostname`-`date +%Y%m%d`.txt" #调用函数库 [ -f /etc/init.d/functions ] && source /etc/init.d/functions export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/root/bin source /etc/profile #root用户执行脚本 [ $(id -u) -gt 0 ] && echo &#34
